div.p:
Curia burgj de aberdene tenta per prepositum balliuos et consilium eiusdem in pretorio dicti burgi
xvijo die mensis marcij anno Dominj Mo iiijco lxxiiijto

quo die curia affirmata balliui continuarunt
wardam et decisionem plegij porrecti per patricium badenach ex parte Johannis gregorij et Recon
trariacionem eiusdem per henricum mortimar ut patet in act' preceden' vsque ad diem lune proximo futuro et cetera

In curia tenta per prepositum et ballivos vicesimo die marcij anno et cetera lxxiiij Andreas
robertson garcifer le partinare cum Dauid bog accusatus de foristallacione
adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro foristallacione pellium

Johannes layng in obyne amerciatur pro foristallacione pellium et corriorum prout deliberatum fuit
per assisam

Eodem die Alexander sanquhare confessus fuit se debere Johanni ruthirfurd
filio andree burgense huius burgi xj s' et x d' soluend' eidem infra quindenam futuram

Die xxja marcij anno prescripto Willelmus robertson de consensu communis consilij Receptus
fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi pro qua libertate
iiij li' composuit cum preposito et consulibus pro quatuor libris datis Willelmo quelp ex
ordinacione consilij in partem solucionis contentacionis sibi promisse alias per Requestam
dominorum Episcopi glasguensis comitis huntlie et aliorum quj quidem Willelmus solitum prestitprestitit
Juramentum plegio pro eo thoma prat quod habebit terram distringibilem infra annum et diem et cetera

Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem burgi tercio
die Aprilis anno Domini mo iiiico lxxvto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in rotulo sectarum quorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento defectu comparencie

Eodem die alexander scrogis super quem lindesay herraldus porrexit plegium ex parte
alicie gilruthe pro iniusta detencione certorum bonorum eedem hereditate pertinen' racione
decessus quondam dominj Johannis gal capellani comparuit cum prelocutore suo Johanne Wormot et
peciit prefatum lindesay herrald' vocari ad prosequendum ipsum secundum tenorem actus desuper
fact' et non comparuit vnde dictus prelocutor extendit plegium in manibus alexandri
andree vnius seriandorum quod quitus fuit de calumpnia predicta quousque attachiatur
per nouam sectam

The same day Wat anffrason in the name and on the behalf of Androw Kynind
mond and of his brothir beand now vteu the Realme protestit solempnitly
before the baillies that nane intromet with the landis pertening to the said androw and
his brothir bath croftis and vthir vnto the hame cuming of thaim bot he erast
quhilk allegis tobe lachfull tutour to thame and nerrest to succede to thame

Eodem die thomas de camera procurator altaris beate virginis marie et capellani
eiusdem accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu xij d' debit'
annuatim dicto altari et a longo tempore non solut' de vna terra iacente ad caput vici
castri inter terram quondam Roberti gillespy ex occidentali parte ex vna et terram eiusdem
roberti ex parte australi Ad quam terram personaliter accedens nichil reperit distringibile
ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia coram
ballivis tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Johanne de torryleith Waltero thomson
burgensibus huius burgi et Duncano straloch sergeando

Item dictus thomas de camera protestatus fuit quod prefatus processus non sibi preiudicaret
quam ad annuum redditum xij d' eidem ut asserit debit' annuatim de terra antedicta

The same day comperit Dauid mathoson perofferand iij s' of annuel of thre
yeris bygane sen his gude fadris decess' quhilkis he layd downe on the
kyst redy for the frething of the said land folowit be thom of chavmer
for the said iii yeris protestand that quhat proces he led of the said land suld
turne him til na preiudice for he denyit all vthir annuel excep the annuel
of xij s' aucht til our lady altar and that thare was bot the said iij s' tobe
pait tharof as said is

the same day the assise deliuerit and ordanit that Johne the vaus ane of the
baillies sal put in write the poyndis that was deliuerit til thom symson
be this day viij dais / and in alsfer as the said Jhone' of vaus previs was
deliuerit til him the said thomas sal deliuer til him sa mony poyndis agane
and that beand done the said bailye sal pay til him xij s'

Eodem die Willelmus voket comparens in curia protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo reddi
tu xij d' sibi ut asserit debit' et a longis temporibus non solut' de vna terra iacente
in vico nauium prope domum sancte trinitatis inter terram quondam domini Roberti patricij capellani
ex parte australi et terram eiusdem Willelmi ex parte boreali Ad quam terram personaliter accedens
nichil reperit distringibile ad dictum annumannuum redditum recuperandum preter terram et lapides quos
presentavit in curia coram ballivis pro primo die processus Testibus Waltero morison
matheo culan burgensibus huius burgi et alexandro andree seriando

head.add: Judicium processus pro domino p tullach

div.p:
Item eodem die perlectis tribus processibus ductis per dominum patricium tullach procuratorem et eo
nomine altaris beati Ninianj in ecclesia parrochiali huius burgi recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam
terre iacente in vico viridi que fuit quondam Johannis colinj inter ecclesiam fratrum carmelitarum
ex parte australi et terram quondam cuiusdam cowtis appellati ex boreali parte et cetera pro
defectu solucionis vj s' et viij d' debito annuatim eidem altari et capellano eiusdem
et a longis temporibus non solut' Vnde dictus dominus patricius capellanus peciit
a ballivis secundum formam sui processus precedentis Juris et Justicie complementum et proprie
tatem dicte terre legitime recuperauit pro defectu solucionis vj s' et viij d' prenotat'
et hoc ex ore Willelmi gregorij Judicatoris curie pro Judicio fuit dat' teste curie

Jacobus de Kintor in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione xxxv s' pro argento salis solut' per
Johannem vaus pro eodem vltra mare / et dictus Jacobus satisfaciet sibi de
dicta summa infra terminum Juris prout decretum fuit per assisam

Willelmus de Kintor conuictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione Johannis vaus
vnius ballivorum verbotenus et pro perturbacione curie et cetera

The vij day of aprile the yer' et cetera lxxv Before the baillies sittand in Jugement
personaly comperit thomy Kyntor with his forspekar' Androw scherar' and chesit
William of Kyntor burges of the said burgh his curate and procuratoure til intromet with
his landis annuel rentis with all and sindri charteris euidencis and quhatsumeuir ayr
schip concerning the said thomas / and to persew folou and Recover all and sindri gudis and
ayrschip in quhais handis that evir thai ar In within the burgh of abirdene And
gif it sal hapin the said thomas todecesse now as than and than as now he orda
nis and constitutis the said William tosuccede til his landis and ayrschippis and annuel
rentis quhatsumeuir and to dispone thare apon at his awne free wil as it
war his awne propir landis annuel rentis and ayrschippis/ the said Williame
and his ayris doand for the said thomas for his saule and to haly kirk as he
wil ansuer' tharefor before god / Adnulland all vthiris procuratouris of before
gif ony was made be him or ony vthiris in his name before thir witnes
Johne the vaus Dauid symson gilbert of ch chavmer thre of the baillies alexander
trail thomas of mar' Johne malisson Johne Wormot androw rettre and ser Robert leis
notar' with vthiris sindrie videlicet Johne of Knollis Richard hil et cetera

Eodem die andreas stevinson amerciatur pro perturbacione alexandri Westland et vxoris eiusdem
alexandri et filie sue et emendabit dampnum ut Jura Volunt
Angusius gariach conuictus per assisam de perturbacione andree stevinson adiudicatur in amerciamento

The same day Dauid mar in amerciament for the wrangwis' cutting of Johne
of marris sowmys as it was deliuerit be the assise and til amend til
him as law wil et Inuenit thomam mar plegium legalem de indempnitate Johannis mar
Johannes mar pater inuenit alexandrum howison plegium de indempnitate Dauid mar

The assise has deliuerit that Johne malisson sal pay and content til alexander trail
within terme of law the waring of viij s' g' And Johne fichet is fundin
dettour til Johne malisson for that viij s' the quhilk some the said
Johne fichet allegit that he left in cop symonsonis hand to the said John'
malissonis behufis And failyeand tharof the said John fichet sal content to the
said Johne malisson as it cumis til viij noblis the pund gret at the
next raiss'

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvijo die mensis aprilis Anno Domini Mo et cetera lxxvo
Quo die sectis vocatis et curia firmata absentes patent

Eodem die thomas palframan adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro Iniusta fractione
communis ordinis huuushuius burgi

Item eodem die cristiana lochhillis in amerciamento curie pro Iniusta perturbacione Ibbote hall
et emendet parti lese secundum quod Jura volunt

Willelmus fortecht adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xxiiijor
s' debitis Patricio stiklaw et Inuenit Johannem futhes dictum gony ple
gium et debitorem ad soluendum dictam summam infra hinc et festum sanctj
martini proximum futurum
Curia ballivorum tenta xxvijo die aprilis anno et cetera lxxv /

quo die Andreas haw
dan conuictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione henrici famuli Johannis Kintor amerciatur et pro
iniusta spoliacione sui cultelli et le grape
Item dictus henricus in amerciamento pro perturbacione andree havdan verbo tantum

Andreas branche amerciatur pro iniusta lesione et percussione vxoris Johannis sancler'
et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt et cetera
Johannes Wormot et Willelmus coupar ipsorum quilibet amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem et cetera

On friday the v day of may yer' et cetera lxxv the aldirman with the maist part of the common
consel has grantit til Gilbert of chavmer in the Recompensacione and assithement of his
harnes for the quhilkis he brocht our soueran lordis lettres apon Alexander blindsel that he
sal haue his watir mail free for the termis of four' yeris eftir the date of this write

The second day of maij the yer' of our lord M iiijC lxxv yeris It was ordanit endit and
concludit be the aldirman and certane persons of Counsel of the quhilkis the names eftir fo
lowis that the offerand and all vthiris offerantis tocum that fallis apon the Rude
dayis salbe diuidit proporcionaly and evinlie betuix the chaplane of the Rude Altar'
and the chaplan of the Browne croice altar quhat evir thai be for the tyme / and
that nothir of the chaplanis of the Rude altar or of the browne croice altar sal haue
singulare proffite til ony of thaim bot that all gudis that ar offerit in the tyme salbe
diuidit evinlie and rychtwisly ymangis thaim / thir ar the Names of the consel that
war present in the tym Alexander of chavmer aldirman Matho fichet Johne of mar androw
scherar' Richard of Kyntor patrik badenach Johne of Knollis Johne the vaus
gilbert of chavmer Dauid symson thre of the balyeis in the tyme Adam of
crafurd William voket Dauid colison thom of fiffe Robert blindsel / and of
spirituale men maistir Androw symson vicar' of aberdene maistir Johne smalee vicar' of
Kyngowdrum maistir Johne levingstoune vicar' of Inuerugy ser Alexander voket
maistir William voket his brothir ser Dauid Vaus' curate of abirdene in the tyme
ser thomas Dauidson ser Robert leis public notar with vthiris sindrie Apon the
quhilk deliuerence and decrete ser Androw the son of quhilum thomas andirson chaplan of
the Rude altar tuke in the tyme of the deliuerence fra ser Robert leis public notar
ane Instrument in the vestry of the parisch kirk of aberdene before the persons forsaid
or the maist part of thaim / and that this decrete and deliuerence soulde nocht be reuokit nor
gaincallit for the tyme of the saidis chaplanis videlicet of ser Alexander club chaplan of the
browne croice altar and of ser androw chaplan of the Rude altare nor eftir thare tyme
bot perpetualy til indure et cetera

The viii day or maij yer' et cetera lxxv Comperit before the Aldirman bailyeis
and certane of the consel Adam lawson procuratour til Wat of spens litteraly con
stitute and askit at the aldirman and bailyeis to gif him possessione be
verteu of his procuratory of the half of a land liand in the vuirkirkgate
the quhilk Johne of spens litstar had sauld til Wat of spens
his asking beand hard / the wif of Adam litstar vmquhile burges
of abirdene allegit that scho was Junctfeft in the forsaid hail land / and
bath the parties removit / the aldirman balyes and consel set hir to preve
hir Junctfeftment this day Moneth videlicet the v day of June next tocum
gif that day be lachfull and failyeand tharof the next lachfull day
thareftir folowand et cetera

Die decima maij anno et cetera lxxv Jacobus Dauidson sutor gracia prepositi et quorundam de
communi consilio receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum huius prestito solito Juramento
xx s' Et soluet preposito pro libertate sua xx s'

The xij day of maij the yer' forsaid Mage the spouse of quhilum thomas quelp in presence
of the aldirman and certane of the consel askit and made request that scho mocht be Respit
for xv dais that scho mycht produce and bring hir lachful vitnes that hir husband gafe
hir state and possessione of his land that he dwelt In in the galowgate / and
gif that scho mycht nocht preve nor mak gude suffisantly that scho had nothir
state na possessione within the xv daies scho soulde devode hir and hir gudis
oute of the said land til thame that had maist resone til it

Eodem die quedam mariota conuicta per assisam de perturbacione iniusta Alizone giffard
menyes amerciatur et emendabit eedem prout Jura volunt

the same day Adam of cardny Donald strathachin and Wil androson has deponit
be the fathis of thare bodijs before the aldirman and balyes that thai herd
Dauy paterson quhom god assoilye charge Dauid mathoson his gude
brothir in law and tutour testamentar' til his son / ger gif state and possessione
til his wif of his Inland liand in the gaistraw / and the aldirman has char
git the balyeis token his son and ayr til his Inland quhil forthirmare that
he and his consel be betir avisit et cetera

The xiij day of maij yer' et cetera lxxv Thom Wat of bervy has takin before
the baillies sittand in Jugement and allegit that the decrete and sentence deliuerit
be certane persons of the quhilkis the names folowis belangand a clame of
viijxx of keling and twa and of xx s' and iiij d' of siluer clamit be henry hartwik
and deliuerit be the said arbitrouris tobe pait to the said henry eftir as
thare deliuerence vndir a procurit seil beris in it self / thir ar the names of the
arbitrouris Johne of straton Johne patrikson William of leis Johne of leis
and Donald belman / the quhilk sentence the said thom Wat is oblist topreve
this day xv dais gif it be lachfull and failyeand tharof the next lach
full day thareftir folowand that that decrete is fals and vntrew and nocht deliue
rit be thaim / failyeand that he previs nocht that day he is dettour of the
sowme

Item the said day henrik hartwik has made constitute and ordanit procuratouris
for him Richard of Kintor and alexander blindsel tofolou the forsaid cause and
todefend for him as he war present in propir persone

Item the forsaid thom Wat has fundin borowis for him thom prat and Johne chapman
that he sal compere the forsaid day as aboue writin and todo that day
to the forsaid henrik and his procuratouris that law wil baith of his costis and
expensis as of the principale sowme

The xxij day of may Richart son til quhilum John' litstar and
bruthir german til quhilum cristy litstar in plane Courte made protesta
cioun' that all thyng at gilbert moryson intromettis with on the
behalff of his bruthir tvrne' nocht til hym to na preiudice in tym
tocum

The sammyn day gilbert moryson is oblist be his hande and his gudis
that he sal halde Alexander tailyour duelland in futy scathles
anent the annuel that he takis fra hym of the land at he duellis
in in futy
